DESCRIPTION: Replaces the current #yCompanion with a new one. While you have a card that can Call a #yMove in your deck, a #yCompanion will be automatically summoned at the start of combat.
Tell your #yCompanion to perform this #yMove at the end of your turn. NL Calling another #yMove will override this #yMove.
Move: The weakest #yMove. NL #yCompanions will default to performing this #yMove on their turn.
Move: Focuses on dealing damage to enemies.
Move: Focuses on granting you #yBlock or weakening enemies.
Move: The most powerful #yMove. NL Effects vary greatly between #yCompanions.
Targeted creatures take #b50% more damage from #yCompanions. NL #yCompanions will prioritize enemies with the most #yTarget.
Return this card to your hand at the start of next turn.
Look at the top X cards on your discard pile. NL You may choose any of them to shuffle into your draw pile.
The next attack you play deals X more damage.
The next card you play that gives you #yBlock gives X more #yBlock.
When drawn, this card is immediately played, spending its energy cost.
A loyal companion, with an insatiable appetite. Has many ways of improving its #yAttack #yMove.
An immense beast, a formidable defense. It has lost neither its loyalty nor its appetite.
A powerful creature, able to #rdestroy all who oppose you. Grant it #yStrength, and watch its #yAttack shred through your foes.
A sad gremlin with nothing but a spear. Give him your attention, and he can become a mighty warrior.
A patient gremlin who eagerly awaits your command to attack. Her #yProtect #yMove will cause you to #yEnter #yCalm.
A tinkering gremlin who loves all kinds of automatons. Her #yMoves are mainly focused on channeling orbs for you.
A cunning gremlin who loves killing things quietly. Play your #yShiv cards on him to improve his next #yAttack.
A mostly insane gremlin, he has recognized your demonic powers and worships you for them. Gains #yStrength whenever you lose HP.
